attributes.action: We would like  to get local councils to allow drivers to use private or M.O.D airfields more by reducing noise restrictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are a lot of cars on the public highways these days and a majority of the owners are sensible with them.We would like to request that local councils see sense and stop restricting our access to the airfields and circuits by imposing noise restrictions.we are trying to be sensible by taking our cars onto private land to enjoy our passions and make the highways a safer place for motorists.

This is being made difficult for us and unfortunately some of the less sensible are going to test their skills on the public highway,where they will end up  damaging private or council owned property,not to mention the safety aspect of it.

I'm sure that the costs of emergency services attending an RTA then the costs of hospital treatment and the subsequent repairs to property would out weigh the costs of allowing drivers more access to airfields.
